title: Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof
overview: Freeze the Fear with Wim Hof follows a group of soul-searching celebrities as they embark on an epic adventure of self-improvement, and face a unique test of mental strength like no other, under the guidance of ‘extreme athlete' and well-being icon Wim Hof, aka ‘The Iceman'.Along the way this ambitious, fresh and thrilling format promises genuine reality, high drama, jeopardy and plenty of laughs.
